prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is recommended for use when writing apps that generate complex content via LLM, separating code from text prompts, describing complex prompt pipelines, orchestrating multiple prompts, and versioning prompts. It's not recommended for simple, single-prompt implementations or when OpenAI Assistant (GPTs) is sufficient.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
